column4: My computer is slow due to a lot of the processor being in the "wa" state according to top. I know that this is time waiting on the hard drive. Is there any way to speed this up. It makes opening even the smallest apps really slow. This didn't happen when I had windows on this computer.
iotop (available in the software center) should list out which processes are hitting your hard drives hard
could have been heavy enough on memory to be swapping.  Running a lot of tabs or flash video?

firefox can get bogged down when there are a massive amount of tabs and its been running for a while.  3.5 is better than 3.0, if you don't have it yet.  Otherwise, I suggest closing and reopening it at least daily
